1#!/usr/bin/env python3 

2 

3""" 

4Userscript for qutebrowser which saves some text that can be retrieved with the key associated with it. 

5The texts are saved on a json in config dir by default 

6""" 

7 

8# Copyright Alexandre Costa do Sim (aledosim) <aledosim@yahoo.com.br> 

9# 

10# This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify 

11# it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by 

12# the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or 

13# (at your option) any later version. 

14# 

15# This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, 

16# but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of 

17# MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the 

18# GNU General Public License for more details. 

19# 

20# You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License 

21# along with this program. If not, see <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 

22 

23import logging 

24log = logging.getLogger(__name__) 

25log.setLevel('DEBUG') 

26 

27# -------------------------------------------------------- 

28# Uncomment this line for debug log 

29#log.addHandler(logging.FileHandler('qute-snippets.log')) 

30# -------------------------------------------------------- 

31 

32from datetime import datetime 

33log.debug('\nStarting execution in {}'.format(datetime.now())) 

34 

35import argparse 

36import os 

37import json 

38 

39SAVE_DIR = os.getenv('QUTE_CONFIG_DIR') 

40 

41# for test purposes 

42if not SAVE_DIR: SAVE_DIR = 'testdir' 

43log.debug('SAVE_DIR: '+str(SAVE_DIR)) 

44 

45JSON_FILE = os.path.join(SAVE_DIR, 'snippets.json') 

46 

47USAGE = """snippets.py [-h] [--set | --get] params 

48 

49This script save some text snippet to a keyword and paste it back when called with the same keyword. 

50It's meant to be used with qutebrowser (see https://qutebrowser.org/). 

51 

52 To save a snippet to a certain keyword: 

53 snippets.py --set <keyword> <text> 

54 

55 To paste a snippet binded to a certain keyword: 

56 snippets.py --get <keyword> 

57 

58 To use it with qutebrowser: 

59 :spawn --userscript snippets.py [--set | --get] params 

60 

61I suggest that you make the following keybinds: 

62 

63 To save a snippet, e.g.: 

64 :bind --mode insert <Ctrl+Alt+1> spawn --userscript snippets.py --set 1 {primary} 

65 

66 To paste a snippet, e.g.: 

67 :bind --mode insert <Ctrl+1> spawn --userscript snippets.py --get 1""" 

68 

69EPILOG = """The snippets are saved on a json in the qutebrowser's configuration folder. 

70For debug log, uncomment the respective line in source.""" 

71 

72argument_parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(usage=USAGE, epilog=EPILOG) 

73argument_parser.add_argument('params', nargs='+', help='<keyword> <text> to use set option or\ 

74 <keyword> to use get option') 

75group = argument_parser.add_mutually_exclusive_group() 

76group.add_argument('--set', '-s', action='store_true', help='set a text to a certain keyword') 

77group.add_argument('--get', '-g', action='store_true', help='get a text saved to a keyword') 

78 

79 

80def qute_paste_text(text): 

81 # Paste text on browser 

82 log.debug('qute_paste_text input: '+str(text)) 

83 

84 cmd = 'insert-text {}\n'.format(text) 

85 with open(os.environ['QUTE_FIFO'], 'w') as fifo: 

86 fifo.write(cmd) 

87 fifo.flush() 

88 

89 

90def qute_show_message(message): 

91 # Show message on browser 

92 log.debug('qute_show_message input: '+str(message)) 

93 

94 cmd = 'message-info "{}"\n'.format(message) 

95 with open(os.environ['QUTE_FIFO'], 'a') as fifo: 

96 fifo.write(cmd) 

97 

98 

99def set_text(key, text): 

100 # Saves a json on SAVE_DIR directory with text associated with key 

101 log.debug('set_text input: '+str((key, text))) 

102 

103 try: 

104 with open(JSON_FILE, 'r+') as snippets: 

105 saved = json.load(snippets) 

106 saved[key] = text 

107 snippets.seek(0) 

108 snippets.truncate() 

109 json.dump(saved, snippets) 

110 

111 except FileNotFoundError: 

112 with open(JSON_FILE, 'w') as snippets: 

113 json.dump({key: text}, snippets) 

114 

115 qute_show_message('Text saved on key {}'.format(key)) 

116 

117 

118def get_text(key): 

119 # Retrieves text from json saved on SAVE_DIR with key 

120 log.debug('get_text input: '+str(key)) 

121 

122 with open(JSON_FILE) as snippets: 

123 registers = json.load(snippets) 

124 

125 return registers[key] 

126 

127 

128def main(arguments): 

129 params = arguments.params 

130 if len(params) == 2: # implicit set 

131 set_text(params[0], params[1]) 

132 elif arguments.get: # explicit get 

133 text = get_text(params[0]) 

134 qute_paste_text(text) 

135 elif len(params) == 2 and arguments.set: # explicit set 

136 set_text(params[0], params[1]) 

137 elif len(params) == 1 and not arguments.set: # implicit get 

138 text = get_text(params[0]) 

139 qute_paste_text(text) 

140 else: # wrong usage or help 

141 log.debug('Invalid arguments') 

142 argument_parser.print_help() 

143 

144 

145if __name__ == '__main__': 

146 args = argument_parser.parse_args() 

147 log.debug('args: '+str(args)) 

148 main(args)
